articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Red Cat Holdings (RCAT): Revisiting Valuation After a Sharp Short-Term Share Price Rebound. Red Cat Holdings (RCAT) has quietly turned into a volatile ride for investors, with the stock surging over the past week and month even as longer term returns remain mixed and fundamentals still in flux. See our latest analysis for Red Cat Holdings. The 7 day share price return of 31.93 percent stands out against a year to date share price loss of 23.81 percent and a 1 year total shareholder return of 23.55 percent. This suggests sentiment is swinging back toward growth despite earlier... Related tickers mentioned: RCAT.

articles.title: The Hidden Risks of America’s Most Popular Prescription Painkiller
articles.mainIdea: The Hidden Risks of America’s Most Popular Prescription Painkiller
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: The Hidden Risks of America’s Most Popular Prescription Painkiller. Gabapentin has soared in popularity as an alternative to opioids, but research is finding that it isn’t as safe or effective as doctors have long thought.
